title.narrative: Enhancing Nigerian Advocacy for a Better Business Environment Programme (Procurement of Services)

description.narrative: This activity (Enhancing Nigerian Advocacy for a Better Business Environment Programme (Procurement of Services)) is a component of Enhancing Nigerian Advocacy for a Better Business Environment (ENABLE) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £11,939,712. This component benefits Nigeria, and works in the following sector(s): Information and communication technology (ICT), Privatisation, Small and medium-sized enterprises (SME) development, Trade policy and administrative management, Research/scientific institutions. , with the following implementing partners: Adam Smith International, Coffey International Development. The start date is 01-10-2008 and the end date is 31-03-2014.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
